currency.accessKeyDescription: API key provided for free by https://exchangerate.host
currency.currencySymbolDescription: Used for display purposes only; changing this will affect all currency units in the system
currency.currencyUnitDescription: Used for display purposes only; changing this will affect all currency units in the system

email.expiration_email_templateDescription: The {after}.variable{before} placeholders will be replaced with actual data. Ensure to keep these variables.
email.maintenance_email_templateDescription: The {after}.variable{before} placeholders will be replaced with actual data. Ensure to keep these variables.
email.sendFailure: Failed to send test email, please check the configuration.
email.sendTestEmailDescription: Send a test email to verify the configuration.
email.senderAddressDescription: The default email address used for sending emails.
email.smtpAccountDescription: The email account used for authentication.
email.smtpEncryptionMethodDescription: Choose whether to enable SSL encryption.
email.smtpPasswordDescription: The password for the SMTP account.
email.smtpServerAddressDescription: Specify the server address used for sending emails.
email.smtpServerPortDescription: Specify the port used to connect to the SMTP server.
email.verify_email_templateDescription: The {after}.variable{before} placeholders will be replaced with actual data. Ensure to keep these variables.

invite.commissionFirstTimeOnlyDescription: When enabled, commission is generated only on the inviter's first payment; you can configure individual users in user management
invite.enableForcedInviteDescription: When enabled, only invited users can register
invite.inviteCommissionPercentageDescription: Default global commission distribution ratio; you can configure individual ratios in user management

node.communicationKeyDescription: Key for node communication to ensure data security
node.nodePullIntervalDescription: Frequency (in seconds) for nodes to fetch data from the panel
node.nodePushIntervalDescription: Frequency for nodes to push data to the panel

register.emailSuffixWhitelistDescription: When enabled, only emails with suffixes in the list can register
register.emailVerificationDescription: When enabled, users will need to verify their email
register.ipRegistrationLimitDescription: When enabled, IPs that meet the rule requirements will be restricted from registering; note that IP determination may cause issues due to CDNs or frontend proxies
register.penaltyTimeDescription: Users must wait for the penalty time to expire before registering again
register.registrationLimitCountDescription: Enable penalty after reaching registration limit
register.stopNewUserRegistrationDescription: When enabled, no one can register
register.trialRegistrationDescription: Enable trial registration; modify trial package and duration first
register.whitelistSuffixesDescription: Used for email verification during registration; one per line
register.whitelistSuffixesPlaceholder: Enter email suffixes, one per line

site.logoDescription: Used for displaying the logo in designated locations
site.logoPlaceholder: Enter the URL of the logo, without ending with '/'
site.siteDescDescription: Used for displaying the site description in designated locations
site.siteDomainDescription: Domain address of the current website, e.g., used in emails
site.siteDomainPlaceholder: Please enter the domain address. For multiple domains, please enter one per line.
site.siteNameDescription: Used for displaying the site name in designated locations

subscription.appDescription: Configure app download URL and import rules; remember to save after modification
subscription.singleSubscriptionModeDescription: When enabled, all user subscriptions will be converted to balance
subscription.subscriptionDomainDescription: Used for subscription; leave blank to use site domain
subscription.subscriptionDomainPlaceholder: Enter subscription domain, one per line

telegram.botTokenDescription: Enter the token provided by Botfather
telegram.enableBotNotificationsDescription: When enabled, the bot will send basic notifications to linked Telegram admins and users
telegram.groupURLDescription: If filled, will be displayed to users or used in required locations

verify.turnstileSecretDescription: Turnstile secret key provided by Cloudflare
verify.turnstileSiteKeyDescription: Turnstile site key provided by Cloudflare
